tswitem.name: Warding Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Warding Augment Resonator
An unattuned healing augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will increase your critical barrier chance by 2,5%/ 5%/ 7,5%/ 10%/ 12,5% for barrier effects applied by this ability.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 3 Attuned Mending Augment Resonators
  • 48 Pure lu runes
  • 48 Pure dust
